replies.msg:
物理有分兩種，一種scalar一種vector
Scalar potential又分好多，起gravitational 或者em可以諗成energy
Vector potential都一樣，但起em唔可以諗成energy, 因為呢個vector potential related to magnetic field, which does not do work.
去到qm又唔同睇法，但之後要等其他巴打補充

replies.msg:
小弟無記錯既話佢個班physics 友為左張Maxwell's equations 既magnetic field 果兩條equations generalize 到好似electric 咁可以有個potential 既gradient 咁take divergence 會變0，所以就用curl 黎define vector potential, i.e. A = curl v。base on this definition, div A =0, which is similar to electric potential case, which is div grad V = 0
sor for 1999
利申淨係UG 讀過下phys
